blog.name: chewbaggins
blog.title: CHEWBAGGINS
blog.description: Things you will find here: Star Wars (no prequels), Marvel/DC comics and movies (expect a lot of Wonder Woman and She-Hulk), Doctor Who (mostly classic), a werewolf or two and an occasional bit of of miscellany.

summary:
You know what I really liked in Captain Marvel?  They didn’t go for the tired “fish out of
water” cliché when Carol was on...
body:
You know what I really liked in Captain Marvel?  They didn’t go for the tired “fish out of water” cliché when Carol was on Earth. She never asked for some futuristic device that doesn’t exist in the 1990s just because it’s common in the Kree Empire. She was never confused by 20th century technology for comedic value (think of Scotty and the “hello, computer” scene in Star Trek IV).  She never tried to use a common item in the wrong way. The closest she came to anything like this was elevating the status of a mall cop to a higher standard.  It’s not like she assumed somebody in a McDonalds uniform was a police officer for a laugh.

It was a refreshing change of pace.

reblog.comment:

The closest she came to anything like this was elevating the status of a mall cop to a higher standard.  It’s not like she assumed somebody in a McDonalds uniform was a police officer for a laugh.

It was a refreshing change of pace.

The closest she came to anything like this was elevating the status of a mall cop to a higher standard.  It’s not like she assumed somebody in a McDonalds uniform was a police officer for a laugh.

It was a refreshing change of pace.
trail.content:

summary: Captain Marvel might have taken place in 1995 and as such had so many amazing 90s references and songs, but Carol had been off...
body:
Captain Marvel might have taken place in 1995 and as such had so many amazing 90s references and songs, but Carol had been off planet and without her memories since 1989. Assuming she eventually gets all her memories back, you know what that means? Carol and Quill both jam to some of the same music from the 70s and 80s.

(I’m hoping she popped back in on Earth over the past couple of decades to check on her family so maybe she’s got some more current Terran culture references but we have no way of knowing yet.)

But yeah I want some music bonding there!

blog.name: o-bunai-o
blog.title: Bunai's unimportant blog
blog.description:
Hello, my preferred username is Bunⓐi (aka. ⓓcembⓘrth). I signed to tumblr to read blog entries because the postings are interesting.
Desc: Black American women, Kinky hair, and a lazy face. Autistic w/bp, quiet, not the best conversationalist but can make quips and mean comments. 
And I'm a lil'ol' lady- Generation Y, tomboy, likely bi.
• Signs - Sagittarius/Dog.
• Personality - INTP.
• Traits - Nice/Two-faced.
• Chronic - Dysthymia/Anxiety/Insomnia
I am active on:
Gaia Online, deviantART, Wikia, Wikipedia, YouTube, and Twitter. I work heavily on the Gaiapedia and Vocaloid Wikia.
I don't watch much live-action shows anymore, so don't expect me to type about them; I am mostly into animated series, comics, random music, and artwork. 
Disclaimer: I am not an exciting person, I am not a good socializing blogger and have minimal communication skills. So it wouldn't be a good idea to Follow Me based on a few bits of content you liked.
My Gaia Online Avatars
                        My PhotographyMy art doodlesMy poemsAvatar archive

body:
I find it amazing, but not surprising, that the same group of YouTubers who ranted about Marvel’s “forced diversity” agenda are now using Monica Rambeau and Adam Brashear as shields to get people to hate on Carol Danvers.

Besides being desperate it is disgusting. I can only hope that people look at the history of these channels and don’t fall for it.

tags: i have feels about those two
summary:
margarethx replied to your post “Petition for Disney/Marvel to make a Talos mini series. Talos would be...”
                    ...
body:
margarethx replied to your post “Petition for Disney/Marvel to make a Talos mini series. Talos would be…”

We have a lot of badass ladies in the MCU so I would be happy even if she was more delicate and soft. She kind of looks like that type and it would be very sweet. Although I won’t protest seeing her kicking ass :D

Yes that’s why I said lowkey badass. Soren isn’t badass like Okoye or Black Widow. The way I see it she’s super sweet 99% of the time but she still has been living in a war all her life and knows how to handle herself in a conflict. And one day she gets really pissed when someone threatens Talos and he totally melts because he’s used to be the protector but nobody ever protects him. That day he promise himself he would be the best man he can ever be for her even with all the blood on his hands.
